original_text: If God refused to do what is right, he could not rule the world. He is the powerful Judge who knows what is right. But you say that he is guilty! korean_text: 정의를 미워하시는 이시라면 어찌 그대를 다스리시겠느냐 의롭고 전능하신 이를 그대가 정죄하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If God refused to do what is right,
he could not rule the world.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 세상을 다스릴 수 없을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He is the powerful Judge
who knows what is right.
But you say that he is guilty!

he could not rule the world.
